oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EXAMPLES OF THE MINIMAX TECHNIQUE IN RELATIVISTIC ATOMIC ONE-ELECTRON CALCULATIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DATTA, S
DATTA, SN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: minimax technique
dirac atoms
bound states
eigenfunctions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several examples of the application of the minimax technique to relativistic calculations on one-electron atoms are given here. Normalizable eigenfunctions corresponding to the ground states of one-electron atoms with various angular momenta are derived analytically.
